tool_description: Validates vendor information against known vendor databases and blacklists to detect suspicious or unknown vendors.

tax_id.description: Vendor tax ID or registration number

check_blacklist.description: Whether to check against fraud blacklist

fuzzy_matching.description: Enable fuzzy name matching for variations

is_blacklisted.description: Whether vendor appears on fraud blacklist
